data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Vienne a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Vienne, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Vienne, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Vienne, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 432,026 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Vienne, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Iu Mien people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 267,479 cultural Christians in the county of Vienne to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Vienne, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 5,374 believers in Vienne and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.
